framework.name: Framework
framework.description: Shared components providing behaviors, data access and other services

web.name: Web
web.description: Desktop UI Widgets for mobile-ready Web Sites and Applications

dataviz.description: Data Visualization Widgets for Desktop and Mobile web apps

mobile.name: Mobile
mobile.description: Framework and Widgets for Mobile Applications

wrappers.name: Server Wrappers
wrappers.description: Supplementary scripts for integration with server-side technologies

components.name: ASP.NET MVC
components.description: Scripts required by Kendo UI for ASP.NET MVC

components.name: ActionSheet
components.description: The mobile ActionSheet widget displays a set of choices related to a task the user initiates.

components.name: Application
components.description: The Mobile application provides a framework to build native looking web applications on mobile devices.

components.name: AutoComplete
components.description: The AutoComplete widget provides suggestions depending on the typed text.It also allows multiple value entries.

components.name: Barcode
components.description: Barcode widget

components.name: Button
components.description: The Button widget navigates between mobile Application views when pressed.

components.name: ButtonGroup
components.description: The Kendo mobile ButtonGroup widget is a linear set of grouped buttons.

components.name: Calendar
components.description: The Calendar widget renders a graphical calendar that supports navigation and selection.

components.name: Chart
components.description: The Chart widget uses modern browser technologies to render high-quality data visualizations in the browser.

features.name: Polar & Radar
features.description: Support for Polar and Radar charts.

components.name: Color tools
components.description: Color selection widgets

components.name: ComboBox
components.description: The ComboBox widget allows the selection from pre-defined values or entering a new value.

components.name: Core
components.description: The DataViz core functions

components.name: Core
components.description: The core of the Kendo framework.

components.name: Data source
components.description: Powerful component for using local and remote data.Fully supports CRUD, Sorting, Paging, Filtering, Grouping, and Aggregates.

features.name: OData
features.description: Support for accessing Open Data Protocol (OData) services.

components.name: DatePicker
components.description: The DatePicker widget allows the user to select a date from a calendar or by direct input.

components.name: DateTimePicker
components.description: The DateTimePicker allows the end user to select a value from a calendar or a time drop-down list.

components.name: Drag & drop
components.description: Drag & drop functionality for any DOM element.

components.name: Drawer
components.description: The Kendo Mobile Drawer widget provides slide to reveal global application toolbox

components.name: DropDownList
components.description: The DropDownList widget displays a list of values and allows the selection of a single value from the list.

components.name: Editor
components.description: Rich text editor component

features.name: Image Browser
features.description: Support for uploading and inserting images

components.name: Effects
components.description: Required for animation effects in all Kendo UI widgets.

components.name: Gauge
components.description: Radial gauge.

components.name: Grid
components.description: The Grid widget displays tabular data and offers rich support for interacting with data,including paging, sorting, grouping, and selection.

components.name: ListView
components.description: The Kendo Mobile ListView widget is used to display flat or grouped list of items.

components.name: ListView
components.description: The ListView widget offers rich support for interacting with data.

components.name: Loader
components.description: Mobile Loader

components.name: MVVM
components.description: Model View ViewModel (MVVM) is a design pattern which helps developers separate the Model (the data) from the View (the UI).

components.name: Menu
components.description: The Menu widget displays hierarchical data as a multi-level menu.

components.name: ModalView
components.description: The Kendo ModalView is used to present self-contained functionality in the context of the current task.

components.name: MultiSelect
components.description: The MultiSelect widget allows the selection from pre-defined values.

components.name: NavBar
components.description: The Kendo mobile NavBar widget is used inside a mobile View or Layout Header element to display an application navigation bar.

components.name: NumericTextBox
components.description: The NumericTextBox widget can format and display numeric, percentage or currency textbox.

components.name: Output: Canvas
components.description: Support for Canvas rendering and image export

components.name: Output: SVG
components.description: Support for SVG rendering

components.name: Output: VML
components.description: Support for VML rendering

components.name: Pane
components.description: Mobile Pane

components.name: PanelBar
components.description: The PanelBar widget displays hierarchical data as a multi-level expandable panel bar.

components.name: PopOver
components.description: The mobile PopOver widget represents a transient view which is displayed when the user taps on a navigational widget or area on the screen.

components.name: QRCode
components.description: QRCode widget.

components.name: Router
components.description: The Router class is responsible for tracking the application state and navigating between the application states.

components.name: Scheduler
components.description: The Scheduler is an event calendar.

components.name: Scheduler Agenda View
components.description: The Scheduler Agenda View

components.name: Scheduler Day View
components.description: The Scheduler Day View

components.name: Scheduler Month View
components.description: The Scheduler Month View

components.name: Scheduler View
components.description: The Scheduler Common View

components.name: ScrollView
components.description: The Kendo Mobile ScrollView widget is used to scroll content wider than the device screen.

components.name: Scroller
components.description: The Kendo Mobile Scroller widget enables touch friendly kinetic scrolling for the contents of a given DOM element.

components.name: Shim
components.description: Mobile Shim

components.name: Slider
components.description: The Slider widget provides a rich input for selecting values or ranges of values.

components.name: Sparkline
components.description: Sparkline widgets.

components.name: SplitView
components.description: The mobile SplitView is a tablet-specific view that consists of two or more mobile Pane widgets.

components.name: Splitter
components.description: The Splitter widget provides an easy way to create a dynamic layout of resizable and collapsible panes.

components.name: StockChart
components.description: StockChart widget and associated financial series.

components.name: Switch
components.description: The mobile Switch widget is used to display two exclusive choices.

components.name: TabStrip
components.description: The mobile TabStrip widget is used inside a mobile view or layout footer element to display an application-wide group of navigation buttons.

components.name: TabStrip
components.description: The TabStrip widget displays a collection of tabs with associated tab content.

components.name: Themes
components.description: Built-in themes for the DataViz widgets

components.name: TimePicker
components.description: The TimePicker widget allows the end user to select a value from a list of predefined values or to type a new value.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: The Tooltip widget displays a popup hint for a given html element.

components.name: Touch
components.description: The kendo Touch widget provides a cross-platform compatible API for handling user-initiated touch events, multi-touch gestures and event sequences (drag, swipe, etc.).

components.name: TreeView
components.description: The TreeView widget displays hierarchical data in a traditional tree structure,with support for interactive drag-and-drop operations.

components.name: Upload
components.description: The Upload widget uses progressive enhancement to deliver the best possible uploading experience to users.

components.name: Validator
components.description: The Validator offers an easy way to do a client-side form validation.

components.name: View
components.description: The View class instantiates and handles the events of a certain screen from the application.

components.name: View
components.description: Mobile View

components.name: Window
components.description: The Window widget displays content in a modal or non-modal HTML window.
